item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: epix
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.dc:creator: epix
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row custom_background="" el_class="no-margin-top" background_image="2358" parallax="yes" min_height="400" full_width="stretch_row" row_height="custom" css=".vc_custom_1431600467398{margin-bottom: 0px !important;background-image: url(http://epix.themeva.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/12/photo-6.jpg?id=3029) !important;}"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

ePix

powerful multi-purpose wordpress + e-commerce theme

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height="custom" custom_background="" css=".vc_custom_1431442582320{padding-top: 60px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

The Essentials to Create Any Great Website

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row custom_background="" background_image="3683" parallax="yes" row_height="custom" css=".vc_custom_1431442575993{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}" full_width="stretch_row"][vc_column width="1/2"][styledbox type="general_shaded" bg_color="#ffffff" icon="icon-cogs fa-cogs" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_position="right" css_animation="appear"][vc_column_inner width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

Drag & DropPage Builder

ePix comes with a standalone version of the marketing leading Visual Composer plugin. In addition to Visual Composer's incredible standard elements, ePix adds it's own fantastic anduniqueelements too.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/styledbox][vc_empty_space height="20px"][styledbox type="general_shaded" bg_color="#ffffff" icon="icon-bar-chart fa-bar-chart-o" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_position="right" css_animation="appear"][vc_column_inner width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

Powerful Admin Options

Too many options can be a headache! ePix has a specific set of powerful admin options to help you create the perfect website. All options areclearly labelled and categorized by an area of the site.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/styledbox][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][styledbox type="general_shaded" bg_color="#ffffff" icon="icon-resize-small fa-compress" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_position="left" css_animation="appear"][vc_column_inner width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

Fully Responsive

A website needs to look fantastic on all devices these days. That's why ePix is constantly developed to ensure that your website looks and functions great on whatever device is viewing it.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/styledbox][vc_empty_space height="20px"][styledbox type="general_shaded" bg_color="#ffffff" icon="icon-thumbs-up-alt fa-thumbs-o-up" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_position="left" css_animation="appear"][vc_column_inner width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

Unlimited Designs

Choose from a selection a pre-designed "Skins" or simply create your own design using the incredibly powerful Live Customizer.Customize the Header & Bodybackground colors / image,as well as the font colors.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/styledbox][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height="custom" custom_background="inherit" css=".vc_custom_1431443528216{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}" full_width="stretch_row"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

Left, Top, Wide or Boxed

Easily control the Header Position, Site Layout, Page Layouts &Row Layouts

Set the Header to Left or Top position and control the Logo & Menu alignment within. Whether you like wide or boxed, ePix gives you both choices. ePix goes further to allow you to control the Page layout and the set the Rows individually to boxed or wide + you can control the height of rows too.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" row_height="custom" custom_background="" css=".vc_custom_1431448387980{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

Need a One-PageSite?

No problem, ePix does that too!

Best of all, it's so simple!Build apage like any other page using the powerful Visual Composer, then add Anchor Names to each row that acts as a section, create the menu and you're done, it's as easy as that!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row custom_background="" background_image="2363" parallax="content-moving-fade" row_height="full_height" css=".vc_custom_1432375713120{background-image: url(http://epix.themeva.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/theme-forest.jpg?id=3113) !important;}" full_width="stretch_row"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text css_animation="appear"]

Parallax + Full Height Goodness

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="bottom-to-top"]
Easily control the height of ANY Row and add Parallax or Background Colors to any page or post.
[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="20px"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][featurebox type="custom" border_color="#e5e1ce" font_color="#5f554d" icon="icon-thumbs-up-alt fa-thumbs-o-up" icon_color="#5f554d" icon_background="#e2decc" icon_position="center" background_color="#ede8d6"]
Add Any Content WithinaParallax Row
[/featurebox][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="no-margin-sides" row_height="custom" css=".vc_custom_1431449113818{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}" custom_background=""][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

Add Galleries Anywhere

item.dc:creator: epix
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row parallax="yes" el_class="no-margin-top" css=".vc_custom_1439201619786{padding-top: 200px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 200px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;background-image: url(http://acoda.com/epix/wp-content/uploads/revslider/epix_home/photographer-self6.jpg?id=3718) !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

The BEST WordPress Photography Theme!

 

Five Star Rating

[icon name="fa-star" iconsize="large" ][icon name="fa-star" iconsize="large" ][icon name="fa-star" iconsize="large" ][icon name="fa-star" iconsize="large" ][icon name="fa-star" iconsize="large" ] Available on ThemeForestwith free Updates & Support
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding="100px 0"][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]

Showcase Your Photography WithStyle!

 

ePix is a responsive fullscreen Photography WordPress theme, perfect for photographers looking to showcase work on a professional platform.

Loaded with a ton of new features unique to ePix, including the Fullscreen slider, stunning galleries, client login, advanced live Skin Editor, Visual Page Builder, Parallax, boxed or full-width site layout and so much more!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row custom_background="inherit" padding="50px 0"][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1405437896913{margin-bottom: 50px !important;}"]

Don't Be Afraid, Click the Galleries!

 

Fullscreen Slider+ 3d Carousel Slider+Stage Slider+Grid Gallery+Group Slider

ePix isn't just a Photography theme it's a Multi-Purpose e-Commerce theme too!

item.title: About Me
item.dc:creator: epix
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" parallax="yes" css=".vc_custom_1438951149093{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 200px !important;padding-bottom: 220px !important;background-image: url(http://162.144.198.167/~acodacom/epix/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/boots41.jpg?id=3368) !important;}" el_class="no-margin-top"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

About Me

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]
with transparent header enabled
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1438791955230{margin-top: -150px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_single_image image="3718" img_size="300x300" alignment="center" style="vc_box_border_circle"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1438792421915{padding-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]

Hello,

Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. Separated they live in Bookmarksgrove right at the coast of the Semantics, a large language ocean. A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia. It is a paradisematic country, in which roasted parts of sentences fly into your mouth. Even the all-powerful Pointing has no control about the blind texts it is an almost unorthographic life One day however a small line of blind text by the name of Lorem Ipsum decided to leave for the far World of Grammar. The Big Oxmox advised her not to do so, because there were thousands of bad Commas, wild Question Marks and devious Semikoli, but the Little Blind Text didnt listen. She packed her seven versalia, put her initial into the belt and made herself on the way. When she reached the first hills of the Italic Mountains, she had a last view back on the skyline of her hometown Bookmarksgrove, the headline of Alphabet Village and the subline of her own road, the Line Lane. Pityful a rethoric question ran over her cheek, then[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="40px"][socialwrap align="center"][socialicon name="pinterest" url="http://themeforest.net/item/epix-fullscreen-photography-wordpress-theme/5783556"][socialicon name="instagram" url="http://themeforest.net/item/epix-fullscreen-photography-wordpress-theme/5783556"][socialicon url="http://themeforest.net/item/epix-fullscreen-photography-wordpress-theme/5783556"][/socialwrap][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1438836870615{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #eb5a39 !important;}"][vc_column][vc_btn title="CONTACT ME" style="outline" color="white" size="lg" align="center" i_icon_fontawesome="fa fa-envelope-o" link="url:%2Fepix%2Fcontact-us||" add_icon="true"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: epix
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Fusce id ligula tellus
item.dc:creator: epix
item.content:encoded:
Fusce id ligula tellus. Suspendisse auctor, felis vel eleifend consectetur, tortor elit vulputate urna, et hendrerit mauris justo porta odio. Nullam in dolor a felis dapibus iaculis id et mi. In egestas, est non pulvinar porttitor, purus massa fermentum sem, quis suscipit purus nulla vitae leo. Nulla vitae porta magna, a porta magna. In ac urna commodo, varius purus eu, pulvinar lectus. Nullam non sodales lectus. Aliquam sit amet adipiscing ipsum. Nulla fermentum ligula quis libero mollis hendrerit.
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Aenean ut ante gravida, varius est vitae, tristique ipsum. Nunc vitae pharetra magna. Cras nec neque accumsan, pellentesque lacus quis, venenatis metus. Etiam magna magna, dictum scelerisque lorem ac, tincidunt convallis felis. Nunc gravida magna ut nisi posuere convallis.
